testcase.name: To perform product search in Amazon site
testcase.system-out: Given I have a search field in Amazon Page..................................passed When I searched a product with name "Ipad" and price of product is 1000.....passed Then The product "Ipad" should display......................................passed

testcase.name: Testing uber booking scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User tries to book the "Sedan" type car...............................passed When User books the "Sedan" type car the pick up location is "Banglore" and drop location "Mandya".passed Then Driver starts the Journey..............................................passed And Driver ends the Journey.................................................passed Then user pays the amout of Rs 2000.........................................passed
